name: Асоциация „Българска книга"
goal: The Bulgarian Book Association activities are aimed at sustainable development of the national book publishing in complience with the European practices and standards, and for promoting reading as a crucial precondition for person's spiritual developement.
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Trade
euInitiatives:
1. Copyright, enforcement & digital single market
• EC proposed Directive on copyright in the digital single market
• Enforcement
• Geo-blocking Regulation
• Platform initiative and revision of the consumer protection legislation
• Online sales of physical goods and supply of digital content
• Initiatives on data including the revision of the public sector information Directive
2. European Accessibility Act and collaboration with the European Blind Union
3. Better information on publishers’ concerns with third countries
4. Open access and open educational resources
5. Culture: Creative Europe programme
